title: I haven't received a chest in forever. Is this normal?
body:
Hi!

I have received all kinds of Ss. I've gotten keys .But I haven't gotten a chest in so long I don't even remember when the last one was. Is this normal?

Extra piece of information: I migrated this account from LAS to NA a few months ago.

replies.body: You can't get chests with champions you already played and got S ranks with. You have to get S ranks with different champions to get a new chest. For example, if you got a chest while playing Yasuo, now you have to play someone else to get another chest.

*Kashirzee* offered some great info here, and I definitely recommend checking to see if you have a chest available first. If you do, be aware that you can only earn one chest per champion per season, and you may need to expand your champion pool to earn more chests!

Check out our [Hextech Crafting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for complete details. Please let me know if you have any questions.

You can only get 4 free chests in a month (you get 1 every week - stores up till 4). If you have already acquired your month's worth, you have to wait a week till another one loads up. You can keep track on whether you have one available on your profile page at the top right corner of your cover photo (where you can see daily win availability)
